articles.description: A flurry of headlines this week flooded social media, documenting a seemingly concerning case of COVID-19 in a San Diego nurse who fell ill about a week after receiving his first injection of Pfizer’s coronavirus vaccine.
articles.content: A flurry of headlines this week flooded social media, documenting a seemingly concerning case of COVID-19 in a San Diego nurse who fell ill about a week after receiving his first injection of Pfizers… [+5848 chars]

articles.author: Pratishtha Tiwari
articles.title: Shed your 2020 pandemic weight with these 7 weight loss tips - Times of India
articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has made most of us gain some extra kilos. Here are 10 easy tips to lose the pandemic weight.
articles.content: Avoid foods like bread, pasta, cakes, cookies and donuts. These can cause a sudden spike in your blood sugar levels.
